NOT_FOUND_FOR_CATEGORY: Unfortunately, nothing was found for the category
SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: What you can do in the settings:
LANGUAGE_SELECTION_DESCRIPTION: Switch the interface language to one convenient for you. Multiple languages are supported, including Russian and English.
ADD_BIRTH_DATE_DESCRIPTION: Add your birth date so we can offer personalized recommendations and discounts.
CONTACT_MANAGER_DESCRIPTION: Write to our manager to ask questions, clarify order details, or get advice.
BRAND_DESCRIPTION: Excellent Jewellery is a young and progressive brand that not only creates custom-made items but also purchases exclusive jewelry at international auctions and exhibitions. We are rapidly gaining popularity and customer loyalty worldwide because our offline boutique network is ideally located on the Mediterranean coast in sunny Antalya, easily accessible from anywhere in the world.
JEWELRY_MEANING: Jewelry with diamonds and precious stones is more than just a piece of jewelry; it's an emotion that conveys your inner strength, energy, and individuality to the world. It's a memory of the best moments, important events, and achievements in your life. Delight yourself and your loved ones by buying as a gift. Remember this wonderful feeling and emotion when purchasing the perfect piece of jewelry.
LIFETIME_GUARANTEE: When you purchase jewelry, we provide a lifetime guarantee and care for your jewelry.
AUTHENTICITY_CERTIFICATION: We guarantee that all jewelry purchased at Excellent Jewellery is authentic and has passed verification for authenticity, confirmed by certificates issued for each piece.
DELIVERY_INFORMATION: Delivery: The average delivery time is 15-20 days. After payment, you can track delivery statuses and receive notifications about updates. You can always contact us 24/7 and even order a car to take you to our offline boutiques.
POINTS_DISCOUNT_INFO: You can get a discount on our products by writing off your bonus points
BAKERY_DESCRIPTION: BylkaBy is not just a bakery and pastry shop, but also a French-style caf√©. You can come here for lunch, try a cream soup or quiche, or enjoy a cup of coffee with dessert with friends. You can taste all our products at any BylkaBy bakery and pastry shop or order delivery straight to your home or office.
